Lam78.First Lines:
Al day we precheal day we vse to techeGood lyf to
                    eche…
Lam78.Last Lines:
…My flesch ys rent as rotyn clothgoddys flesch was euere myn
                    oth
Lam78.Editions:
James,  Montague Rhodes,  and  Claude Jenkins.  
             A Descriptive Catalogue of the Manuscripts in the Library of Lambeth
                Palace.
         2 vols. Cambridge, 1930-32: 1.133 (6 lines only).
